definition: to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: M. considered himself a battler, a fighter.
sentences.chinese: 仍將自己看作是一個戰鬥者，鬥士。

sentences.english: The army said dozens of Taliban militants and several soldiers were killed.
sentences.chinese: 軍隊說幾十個塔里班戰鬥者和一些軍人被殺。

sentences.english: The surging blood of our warriors .
There will need to be a balance found by Fighters for their stamina level and special hits.
sentences.chinese: 在戰鬥者之間，需要有一種耐久和特殊的撞擊平衡。
